languages.text: "Я видел{mf||а}, что ты лгал себе и мне о своих чувствах. Я тебе важ{mf|ен|на}, вот ты и пытаешься себя наказать. Но я в этой игре не участвую. Иди и служи".

"I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."
languages.original_text: "Я видел{mf||а}, что ты лгал себе и мне о своих чувствах. Я тебе важ{mf|ен|на}, вот ты и пытаешься себя наказать. Но я в этой игре не участвую. Иди и служи".

traits.locale_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

"I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

"I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

languages.text: « J'ai bien compris que vous mentez, autant à vous-même qu'à moi. Je compte beaucoup pour vous, c'est pourquoi vous essayez de vous punir. Mais je n'ai pas envie de jouer à ce petit jeu. Remettez-vous au travail. »
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai bien compris que vous mentez, autant à vous-même qu'à moi. Je compte beaucoup pour vous, c'est pourquoi vous essayez de vous punir. Mais je n'ai pas envie de jouer à ce petit jeu. Remettez-vous au travail. »

languages.text: 「君は自分の気持ちについて、{mf|俺|私}にも自分自身にも嘘をついていることがわかった。{mf|俺|私}は君にとって大切な存在だから、君は自分を罰しようとしている。でもそれは君の勝手なゲームだから、{mf|俺|私}は乗らない。さあ、持ち場に戻って義務を果たしなさい」
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: 「君は自分の気持ちについて、{mf|俺|私}にも自分自身にも嘘をついていることがわかった。{mf|俺|私}は君にとって大切な存在だから、君は自分を罰しようとしている。でもそれは君の勝手なゲームだから、{mf|俺|私}は乗らない。さあ、持ち場に戻って義務を果たしなさい」

languages.text: «Vi que nos estaba mintiendo, a mí y a sí mismo, sobre sus sentimientos. Le importo, y por eso intenta castigarse. Pero ese juego es suyo y no participaré en él. Vaya y atienda a sus deberes».
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: «Vi que nos estaba mintiendo, a mí y a sí mismo, sobre sus sentimientos. Le importo, y por eso intenta castigarse. Pero ese juego es suyo y no participaré en él. Vaya y atienda a sus deberes».

languages.text: “我早就知道了。关于我的事情，关于你的感觉，你一直都在自欺欺人。我在你心里很重要，所以你打算惩罚你自己。不过，那是你的游戏，我可不打算玩。去履行你该履行的职责吧。”
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: “我早就知道了。关于我的事情，关于你的感觉，你一直都在自欺欺人。我在你心里很重要，所以你打算惩罚你自己。不过，那是你的游戏，我可不打算玩。去履行你该履行的职责吧。”

languages.text: "Hislerinle ilgili hem kendine hem bana yalan söylüyorsun. Beni önemsiyorsun, bu yüzden kendini cezalandırıyorsun. Bu oyunu sen başlattın, ben parçası olmam. Git, görev bekler."
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: "Hislerinle ilgili hem kendine hem bana yalan söylüyorsun. Beni önemsiyorsun, bu yüzden kendini cezalandırıyorsun. Bu oyunu sen başlattın, ben parçası olmam. Git, görev bekler."

languages.text: "Ich habe gesehen, dass Ihr Euch selbst und mich hinsichtlich Eurer Gefühle belogen habt. Ich bin Euch wichtig, deshalb versucht Ihr, Euch selbst zu bestrafen. Aber dieses Spiel mache ich nicht mit. Geht und widmet Euch Euren Pflichten."
languages.original_text: "I saw that you were lying to yourself and me about your feelings. I am important to you, so you're trying to punish yourself. But that is your game, and I'm not playing. Go and attend to your duties."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe gesehen, dass Ihr Euch selbst und mich hinsichtlich Eurer Gefühle belogen habt. Ich bin Euch wichtig, deshalb versucht Ihr, Euch selbst zu bestrafen. Aber dieses Spiel mache ich nicht mit. Geht und widmet Euch Euren Pflichten."
